LightningComponentBundle.description: This allows for dynamic fields to create a record.

property.name: successMessage
property.label: Success Message
property.description: Message to display when record is created

property.name: redirectToRecordOnCreate
property.label: Open New Record on Create?
property.description: Set to true to redirect to the new record on successful creation

property.name: includeCancelButton
property.label: Include Cancel Button?
property.description: Set to true to also include a cancel button

property.name: pinToBottom
property.label: Pin To Bottom?
property.description: Set to true to pin the button to the bottom of the page
